com.saic.uicds.core.em.service

Interface LEITSCService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LEITSCServiceImpl

    @Transactional
public interface LEITSCService
    The UICDS LEITSC Service provides the ability for a CAD system to post Detailed CFS messages to the UICDS core, when an incident is created, updated, and cleared. This service is an adaptor for LEITSC messages to the IncidentManagementService interface.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aruna Hau

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the current version of the UICDS incident work product published for a LEITSC incident.
      String postDetailedCFSMessage(String message)
      Posts a Detailed CFS message to the UICDS core.

    • Method Detail

      • postDetailedCFSMessage

        String postDetailedCFSMessage(String message)
                              throws DetailedCFSMessageException,
                                     DetailedCFSMessageXMLException,
                                     LEITSCIncidentPublicationException,
                                     org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException
        Posts a Detailed CFS message to the UICDS core. A UICDS incident will be created, updated, or closed/archived, based on the message's activity status.
        Parameters:
        XmlObject -
        Returns:
        boolean - status of the request
        Throws:
        DetailedCFSMessageException
        DetailedCFSMessageXMLException
        LEITSCIncidentPublicationException
        org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException
        org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException
        IOException
        SAXException
        ParserConfigurationException
        XPathExpressionException
        org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.UICDSException
        org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException
